welcome to the game!

Click on "Flip one coin" to go to a page where you can flip a singular coin!

Click on "Flip multiple coins" to go to a page where you can flip many coins!

Click on "Guess the result" to go to a page where you can guess how a coin will land when flipped!

Have fun!

Single Flip!

Click the bottom left corner button to flip a coin!

Multi Flip!

Put in the number of coins you want to flip, then press the submit button to flip those coins!

This is your number :

0?

Here is where the coins will show!

    Guess The Result!

    Press the button of your guess below for how a single coin will land when flipped!

    Whether you win or lose will show up here!
